descriptionHTML:
Heroes of guardians of the galaxy in one watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Your favourite heroes of guardians:
✔ Star Lord
✔ Groot
✔ Drax
✔ Rocket
✔ Gamora

GotG Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Several themes
✔ Custom colors
✔ Battery level

How to use GotG Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, it will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new GotG Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us! Collection of Heroes will be constantly updated:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market

Now GotG heroes will always be with you!
Enjoy!
comments: This is a great watchface once it actually gets going. You have to have heroic levels of patience because it takes forever to sync to your watch (on Huawei) I had to install a second time through my watch instead of my phone which seemed to do the trick. I really love the color options for the faces as well.
